meanings.sent1: The lethean potion made him forget all his worries.
meanings.sent2: The medicine had a lethean effect on her memory.
meanings.sent3: After drinking the lethean elixir, he couldn't even remember his own name!
meanings.sent4: The lethean power of the magical spell erased all traces of the past.
meanings.sent5: The lethean fog enveloped his mind, erasing all memories.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the river Lethe in Greek mythology.
meanings.sent1: The lethean waters were said to induce forgetfulness in those who drank from it.
meanings.sent2: The ancient tale spoke of the lethean river that erased memories.
meanings.sent3: In the myth, the lethean river flowed with magical forgetfulness.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams were filled with the lethean whispers of the ancient river.
meanings.sent5: The lethean essence of the river Lethe lingered in the air, casting a spell of forgetfulness.

meanings.definition: Inducing a state of forgetfulness or oblivion.
meanings.sent1: The lethean music lulled him into a peaceful state of oblivion.
meanings.sent2: The lethean atmosphere of the room made her forget all her troubles.
meanings.sent3: The lethean aroma of the flowers made everyone in the room forget their worries.
meanings.sent4: The lethean spell cast by the sorcerer plunged the village into a deep forgetfulness.
meanings.sent5: The lethean touch of the mysterious artifact erased memories with a single contact.
